FLY
(ecomarine
FLYING BOATS
ALWAYS OVER THE WATER
Acromarine 11- Passenger Enclosed Cabin Flying Limousine
Nothing more serious can happen to an Aeromarine in flight than
an enforced descent-and herein is one of the great advantages
of travel in flying boats-you always, always have the necessary
alighting space.
You fly only over the broad free
spaces of the
water's surface.
This gives you the knowledge of 100 per cent.
safety when you take your flight.
AEROMARINE AIRWAYS, Inc. (Great Lakes Division)
CLEVELAND STATION AND TICKET OFFICES
D and C Dock-Foot of 9th Street.

Tickets can also be purchased at the D and C Ticket Offices
Uptown Office -2010 East 9th Street.
Phone: Main 218.
Dock-Foot of Ninth Street. Phone: Main 5704
Aeromarine passengers may use the waiting rooms of the D and C Co. until
taken out to the flying boats in our motor launch.

Operating Base and Passenger Station-Memorial Park
and the River. Automobile
Entrance, East Side of Park at
8820 Jefferson Avenue, East.
Phone: Hickory 6954.
Office and Downtown Passenger Station -Foot of 1st Street
Phone Cadillac 5480
Tickets can also be purchased at the D and C Ticket Offices

FLY
WITH THE FAMgUS
ecomarine
"BLACK TAIL" FLEET
Acromarine Navy Six Seat Open Cockpit Fling Boat
Equally at home on the water as in the air
"Remarkable Performance"
OF THE
Aeromarine Flying Boats
150,380 Miles Flown in Absolute Safety
10,700 Passengers Carried
The Aeromarine Airways Fleet is manned by officers
and crews with a record of long and faithful service
in aerial
transportation. After thorough tests by
the U.
S. Government they have been passed by
authorities as men of proven worth and ability to
fly seaplanes for passenger carrying.
Special Charter Parties
Arrangements can be made for special flights to any point on the
Great Lakes or the St. Lawrence. Rates are exceedingly low.
AEROMARINE AIRWAYS, Inc. (Great Lakes Division)

"Be Sure It's An Aeromarine"
On Your Vacation This Summer-Fly In An
Aeromarine
REG. U.S. FAT. OFFICE
